entry.title: $2695 // Amazing 1 BED/ 1 BATH in Full Service Luxury Building!! pool! gym! NO
entry.content:
Amazing 1 BED/ 1 BATH in Full Service Luxury Building!! Pool! Gym! NO Fee!

Listing ID #: 281190
Price: $2,695
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: Pets OK

Building Amenities

Doorman
Elevator
Health Club
Pool
Garage
Laundry
Storage
Lounge
Valet
Roof Deck
Common Outdoor Space

Apartment Amenities

Dishwasher
Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Laundry In Unit
Light
Marble Bath
NO FEE
Renovated
Stainless Steel Appliances
Washer
Open Kitchen
Microwave

So Close to Manhattan, it's only 2 stops further to Midtown. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances, including a microwave and dishwasher. The floors, the windows are floor to ceiling, there is a surround sound iPod dock built into the wall, and this unit comes with a washer/dryer! The building is brand new! The building is 2-3 blocks away from the Jay Street/Borough Hall subway stops. Roofdeck, fitness center, and POOL fees are waived for the first term of your lease! Twenty-four hour doorman/concierge/valet service awaits your every need, including optional maid and laundry service! This is the hottest new building in Downtown Brooklyn!

The Hottest FULL SERVICE LUXURY building in the heart of Brooklyn's Downtown - Boerum Hill , Brooklyn Heights , Downtown Brooklyn , DUMBO area!

**Pictures may be of a similar unit depending on availability **no fee ** Incentives subject to change**
 

 

Hillel Realty Group   917-574- 3548   FAX 718-456-7188  Email: CRush@hillelrealtygroup.com
